DinnerPlanner Settings Hello world! Participants: Total Cost Start Welcome to Dinner Planner!

 Here you will be able to easily plan your dinner.

 On the next page start by selecting number of participants.
 Then select your courses.

 Watch Magic Happen! 4 persons Ingredients Instructions Choose Menu Starter Main Course Dessert Create Bakedbrie Icecream Toast Sourdough Meatballs Choose Cost: 80kr
